I think I asked this before and forgot the answer, but what does his 
cyclone gun do? Oh, and is he firing at Liono or Dark?




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> As the energy fire fizles around him, one of the blasts hiting his 
foot, he
> feels the familiar feel of the blade in his side again, he pulls his
> Cyclone gun out of subaspace and whirls around, smoke pouring out 
of his
> new wound, "Back offf" He shouts, opening fire at pointblank.
